name: WordPress Login Plugin Custom Login – Login Template – Login Security – Members Login Page Styler
author: Zia Imtiaz

sections.description:
Custom Login Page Styler is a Login Customizer , Custom Login designer , Custom Login Template and Login Security plugin .
Hepls protect your login page against login bruteforce and spam protection with login captcha for wordpress membership users.
SIMPLE AND EASY WORKFLOW .
Say goodbye to boring, simple, plain WordPress login page and create one with you our own logo, your own branding, colors, background and so much more . Login Page Styler Custom Login is different by design because it is focused on efficiency, login security and reliability for your sites members and clients.
Custom Login Page Spam protection with Google reCaptcha
Google reCAPTCHA is built for security. It always stays at the forefront of spam and abuse fighting trends. reCAPTCHA is on guard for you, so you can rest easy.It helps fight against Bots and Spammers to login to your site membership area.
Login Page Security with Limit Login Attempts.
If you use this plugin, It will limit the number of times a user can attempt to login to your site.
Limit Login Attempts for Login Page Protection, Protect site from Brute Force attacks.

  • Customize Login Logo. Add your own logo to login page admin login client login or for membership user login page
  • Prebuilt Custom Login Page Templates.
  • Google Fonts to add custom fonts on login page .
  • Customize Login Form Colors as per your design .
  • Change Login Page Background Colors .
  • Customize Login form Border styling.
  • Customize Login Page Label Colors .
  • Change Login Button Color.
  • Add Background Image on Members Login Page.
  • Add Background Image on Login Form.
  • Customize Login Links color.
  • Login Form Field Customizing.
  • Add custom logo title with custom login.
  • You can hide login logo if u want.
  • You can hide login error message.
  • Hide login navigations links eg: lost password link or back to blog link.
  • You can add custom login logo link.
  • You can change login form position.
  • You can Change login form label font size.
  • Change login form border color, border style, border radius .
  • Change login form input fields border size, color, style, radius.
  • Change login button color, border size, border color , border radius.
  • Change login button hover border size, border color, border radius.
  • Custom navigation links color , navigation links hover color , links size.

Custom Login Page Styler plugin is also compatible with any plugin that hooks in the login form including :
1. BuddyPress,
1. bbPress,
1. Limit Login Attempts,
1. Login Captcha plugins.
1. Custom Login Security plugins.
1. woocommerce plugins.
1. Membership plugins.
1. Facebook Login , Twwitter Login , or any Social login plugins.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin to your ‘wp-content/plugins’ directory, or download and install automatically through your admin panel.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Login page styler Custom login installed and activated but not working, what should i do?

Open custom login – login page styler settings page from dashboard and Enable plugin button , then save settings.

What image size to use for login background image?

Whatever image size you want you can use for login page , it will set as cover because custom login login page styler is designed to set the background image cover

What image size to use for logo image for login page?

You can use 300 X 200 px logo for login page with custom login – login page styler plugin .

What if I need to style login page element if plugin doesn’t offer?

Custom login – login page styler give you option to customize nearly every element on login page, but if there\’s is an element you think needs customization, you can do that in \”Custom CSS\” box available in custom login – login page styler plugin .

I’m not a designer for custom login, can you customize our login ?

Yes, we can customize your login page for you which will match your WordPress site theme. for that Contact us at ziaimtiaz21@gmail.com.

Do I need coding skills to design my login page?

No, Custom login – Login Page Styler is created for those who don’t know how to code. You can just choose from given options how should a specific element will looks like.

Can i change login form position ?

Yes, Custom login – login page styler gives you ability to change login form position.

Can i change login form opacity to transparent ?

Yes, In settings page of custom login – login page styler we have created a RGBA input field in which you just have to paste a color value with its alpha value to make form transparent for example 255,255,255,0.5 the last vale(0.5) is the opacity value to make login form transparent.

Can i change login form label color with this plugin ?

Yes, You can change login form label color with custom login – login page styler.

Can i change login form label font style ?

Yes, You can change login form label font with custom login – login page styler.
sections.changelog:
Version 6.2 Released

  • Fixed Logo Width height issue.
  • Fixed Template Issue.
  • Fixed Limit Login Attempts.
  • Fixed Logo.

Version 4.2.5 Released
* Fixed Logo Width height issue.
* Fixed Cover Issue.
* Limit Login Attempts

Version 3.1.5 Released

Added New Features

  • Custom Login Templates.
  • Google ReCaptcha for login
  • Slide value selector for text size ,border size ,border style.
  • Navigation link hover color.
  • Navigation link text size.
  • Google font for login form.

Version 2.1 released.Added New Features

  • Logo upload button.
  • Login Body background image upload button.
  • Login Form background image upload button.
  • Custom Login Label fonts.
  • Custom Login border size.
  • Custom Login Form border color.
  • Login Form border style.
  • Login Form input field border size.
  • Login Form input field border color.
  • Custom Login Form input field border color.
  • Custom Login Form input field border style.

short_description: Custom Login Page Styler is a Login plugin allows to customize and protect your login, admin login, user login and register user login.
